statements: UPDATE customer_behavior SET investment_amount = 500.00, risk_preference = 'High' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE CustomerBehavior SET behavior_type='Active' WHERE customer_id=101;

UPDATE CustomerBehavior SET behavior_type = 'purchase', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE customer_id = 1001;

UPDATE Customers SET customer_balance = customer_balance + 100 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Recommendations SET recommendation_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE recommendation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_balance = customer_balance + 1000 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InvestmentProducts SET product_price = product_price * 1.2 WHERE product_category = 'Technology';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE investments SET investment_amount = 5000.00, investment_type = 'Stocks' WHERE investment_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE portfolios SET investment_id = 201, risk_profile_id = 2 WHERE customer_id = 102;
